title: Amy Schumer
description:
Kevin sits down with the hilarious Amy Schumer to talk about how motherhood has changed her comedy, accidentally naming her son ‘genital’ for a month, and how your sex life changes once you are a parent. 

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds!
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (amy schumer, Kevin Hart)
